timeline.message: New version will not support outdated http-invoker rpc protocol anymore
Refactor protobuf compiler support (gRPC and Dubbo), add Reactive gRPC support.
Revert "change attachment type from Map<String,String> to Map<String,Object> (#4311) (#5455)
fix getColonSeparatedKey() does not work in 'registry.simplified=true' mode. (#5465)
[Bugfix] Refactor the default timeout  and change it for Nacos (#5476)
InstanceInfo.InstanceStatus should be OUT_OF_SERVICE when unregister (#5469)
Enhance consumer side thread model: threadless executor (#5490)
fix potential performance drop of URL operations introduced in #4310 (#5491)
remove service discovery samples to dubbo-samples project.

[Dubbo-5495] Services can't be exported for projects driven by annotation but with EnableDubbo/EnableDubboLifecycle not enabled (#5496)

Fixes #5495

Fix multi protocol does not work when referencing in ProviderConfig (#5498)

fix #5398

[Dubbo-5495] The dubbo services can't be exported (#5503)

Fixes #5495
coordinate spring and dubbo shutdown hook. (#5504)

[Dubbo-5336] Fix nacos registry can not subscribe one interface more than 1 time (#5509)

Fixes #5336
Fixes #5511, gRPC client does not update channel status accordingly as server instance status change. (#5515)
add auto-generated Regsitry and Protocol to ConfigManager (#5516)
keep destroy protocols logic the same with DubboShutdownHook (#5517)
Rename onReponse in ClusterInterceptor to onMessage (#5528)
RpcContext to support String and Object.

Revert "RpcContext to support String and Object."

This reverts commit 404dc41c
fix attachments in UT not match

timeline.bodyText: 这里是不是也增加一个getObjectAttachment(xxx)
timeline.author: cvictory

replies.bodyText: 我给改为 empty map 吧，不过实际上 alibaba.invocation 是不会用到 ObjectAttachment 接口的

timeline.bodyText: 这个类是不是可以删除？

replies.bodyText: 我觉得我们可以暂且把它留在这里，可能有一些 String 到 Object 转换的场景
replies.author: chickenlj

timeline.bodyText: 这里是不是需要加上空字符的判断，原来的逻辑里有。
timeline.author: cvictory

replies.bodyText: 上面已经有 null 判断了
replies.author: chickenlj

timeline.bodyText: 整个类的文件都变化了，改动点很难看清。
timeline.author: cvictory
